channel.title: Secrets on EasyCloudHost - Simple, Secure and Scalable cloud services
channel.description: Recent content in Secrets on EasyCloudHost - Simple, Secure and Scalable cloud services

item.title: What are Kubernetes secrets?
item.description: Kubernetes Secrets are a way of protecting data that is needed by applications running in a Kubernetes cluster, but which should not be exposed to the outside world.
